mapper.select: SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pcontent, p.bname, b.bno, b.bname, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall, p.pregdate, p.pdiscount, p.plikeamount FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.pcode = #{pcode} AND p.bname = b.bname

SELECT rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pcontent as pcontent, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.clarge = #{category.clarge} AND p.cmedium LIKE '%' AND p.csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bname = p.bname ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{page.startRowNo}
SELECT * FROM color WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT distinct(psize) FROM stock WHERE pcode = #{pcode} ORDER BY CASE psize WHEN 'S' THEN 1 WHEN 'M' THEN 2 WHEN 'L' THEN 3 END ASC, psize ASC
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product WHERE clarge LIKE '%' AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%'
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product WHERE clarge = #{clarge} AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%'

SELECT rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pcontent as pcontent, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.clarge LIKE '%' AND p.cmedium LIKE '%' AND p.csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bname = p.bname AND b.bname = #{brand.bname,javaType=String ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{page.startRowNo}

SELECT distinct(bname) FROM product WHERE clarge = like '%' AND cmedium like '%' AND csmall like '%'
SELECT distinct(bname) FROM product WHERE clarge = #{clarge} AND cmedium like '%' AND csmall like '%'
SELECT distinct(c.colorurl) FROM product p, color c WHERE p.clarge like '%' AND p.cmedium like '%' AND p.csmall like '%' and p.pcode = c.pcode and rownum <= 28
SELECT distinct(c.colorurl) FROM product p, color c WHERE p.clarge = #{clarge} AND p.cmedium like '%' AND p.csmall like '%' and p.pcode = c.pcode and rownum <= 28
SELECT distinct(c.colorurl) FROM product p, color c WHERE p.clarge = #{clarge} AND p.cmedium = #{cmedium} AND p.csmall like '%' and p.pcode = c.pcode and rownum <= 28

SELECT pcode, pno, pregdate, pamount, pprice, pname, rnum, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pcolor FROM ( SELECT pcode, pno, pregdate, pamount, pprice, pname, ROWNUM as rnum, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall, pcolor FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pno as pno, p.pregdate as pregdate, s.pamount as pamount, p.pprice as pprice, p.pname as pname, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall, c.pcolor as pcolor, s.psize as psize, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY p.pcode ORDER BY p.pno DESC) AS rn FROM product p, brand b, color c, stock s WHERE p.pcode = c.pcode AND c.pcodecolor = s.pcolor AND c.pcode = s.pcode AND p.clarge = #{category.clarge} AND p.cmedium = #{category.cmedium} AND p.csmall = #{category.csmall} AND b.bname = p.bname
AND p.bname in

AND c.pcolor like '%'
AND c.pcolor = #{color.pcolor}
AND s.psize = 'XXXS'
AND s.psize = 'XXS'
AND s.psize = 'XS'
AND s.psize = 'S'
AND s.psize = 'M
AND s.psize = 'L'
AND s.psize = 'XL'
AND s.psize = 'XXL'
AND s.psize = 'XXXL'
AND s.psize = 'XXXXL'
AND s.psize like '%F'
AND s.psize = 'ETC'
AND s.psize like '%'
AND p.pprice > 0 and p.pprice < 100000
AND p.pprice >= 100000 and p.pprice < 300000
AND p.pprice >= 300000 and p.pprice < 500000
AND p.pprice >= 500000 and p.pprice < 1000000
AND p.pprice >= 1000000
AND p.pprice >= 0
and p.pno = (select max(pp.pno) from product pp where pp.pno = p.pno) ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page.endRowNo} and rn = 1 ) WHERE rnum >= #{page.startRowNo}

order by pprice desc
order by pprice asc
order by pname asc
order by pname asc
